articles.title: A baby formula recall linked to an infant botulism outbreak is expanding. Here’s what to know.
articles.description:
The FDA is investigating 84 cases of infant botulism detected since August. Of those, 15 consumed ByHeart formula, the agency said in a statement.

The post A baby formula recall linked to an infant botulism outbreak is expanding. Here’s what to know. appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: White House’s 50-year mortgage proposal has one notable benefit but a number of drawbacks
articles.description:
A borrower would pay, roughly, an additional $389,000 in interest over the life of a 50-year mortgage compared to a 30-year mortgage, according to an AP analysis.

The post White House’s 50-year mortgage proposal has one notable benefit but a number of drawbacks appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: JFK’s grandson Jack Schlossberg announces bid for U.S. House seat in New York
articles.description:
Schlossberg has drummed up a large following on social media with frequent posts weighing in on national issues, including taking aim at his cousin, Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
